title: 我想請問大家這句文法
content:
The city is now as well known for its fashion-related businesses and design institutes as it is for its achievements in textile technology.

now後面那個as是什麼意思，是什麼詞性？
我知道institutes後面的as有如同的意思，但是第一個as我不知道是什麼意思？
excerpt: The city is now as well known for its fashion-related businesses and design institutes as it is for
